title: UNABLE TO LOAD GAME AFTER CHAMPION SELECT
body:
My game has been working fine but since yesterday I am having trouble with starting league. Now, after the champion selection screen, the game won't load but when I restart my client, it tells me to reconnect to the game but the game won't load.

I have updated my driver to newest, bypass my firewall and anti-virus, re-install the game, repair client but none of those work and I did not have a recent system restore.

Thank you for the help

replies.body:
Thanks for all the troubleshooting done so far!  I'd like to take some extra steps to try and rule out possibilities!  For example, did you recently update to the Windows anniversary edition?  There was some updats made to the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), which seems to cause issues for some players.  Try disabling it, and see if you can get in-game then.  

If that doesn't fix this up, let me know and provide some more details like any error messages you're getting exactly.  For example, does the loading screen appear at all or is it a blank screen?  These details can help a lot.  Thanks!

Hi, thanks for the reply, I didn't update to windows anniversary recently. So when the timer in champion select goes down to zero, a riot icon should appear in the middle and it should show up the player loading screen, but the riot icon didn't show and there was no error message. If i click the riot icon on the bottom right and open up the client, it would say that game is still in progress and show that I am in a game. And if I restart my client, it would tell me to reconnect to the game, but the same thing happen when I try to reconnect and nothing would show up.

This is great info, thanks!  It sounds like your network can't connect to your game server.  When champion select ends your connection moves over to the game server, but it looks like you're ending up in an idle state instead.   No worries, this can get fixed up by going over the series of steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This should get you back in without issue, but let me know if the problem persists.
Hi, I really appreciate the help, I run the hextech tool and configuring the IP and now I can play the game again. Thank you so much.

This just happened to me, and its frustrating. I installed the hextech thing, no change. i changed my internet connection, No change. So i have to assume its a problem with the client and not my connection.
I am having the same problem right now to. I have restarted the client changed connection and nothing works. i spam the reconnect button but nothing happens. And the worst part is that you get a ban.
I have found a trick. You go on settings and you hit repair files. It works but it takes an hour for you to be able to play.
